Introduction

Yoo Hweseung is a South Korean singer and songwriter under FNC Entertainment. He is currentlly the vocalist of the band "N.FLYING". Before making his debut, Hweseung participated in the hit survival show "Produce 101 Season 2".

Fun facts

1
Hweseung and Lee Hong Gi had released the song ''Still Love You'' as part of a project called ''FNC Lab''
…
2
He played the male protagonist 'Galileo' in the musical 'We Will Rock You'
…

He had completed his military service (from 2014/07/01 to 2016/03/31)
…
4
He was a participant of “Produce 101 Season 2”
…
5
Hweseung had participated several times on the show 'Immortal Songs' and earned the title of the '2019 Super Rookie', he won once with a cover of 'We are the Champions' by Queen
